title: Gaussian Process Classification
description: This lab demonstrates how to use Gaussian Process Classification (GPC) in scikit-learn library for Python. The aim is to show how to train and test a GPC model, plot iso-probability lines, and evaluate the classification performance.

meta.title: Gaussian Process Classification Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to use Gaussian Process Classification in Python for classification tasks.
meta.keywords: gaussian process, classification, machine learning, python, scikit-learn
